question: DDL commands are used to:
Which statement is TRUE?
options: DROP removes both data and structure
REMOVE is to delete the data
answer: DROP removes both data and structure

What is the output of this query? UPDATE emp SET salary = salary + 5000 WHERE emp_id = 101;
options: Increases salary of emp_id 101 with salary 5000
answer: Increases salary of emp_id 101 with salary 5000

question: What is the output of this query? SELECT emp_name FROM emp WHERE dept_id = 20 AND salary > 30000;
A table EMP has 5 columns. One column SALARY has a DEFAULT value. Which INSERT statement is VALID?
options: INSERT INTO emp (emp_id, emp_name, dept_id, salary) VALUES (101,'Anu',10,30000);
INSERT INTO emp (emp_id, emp_name, dept_id, location) VALUES (101,'Anu',10,'Hyd');

question: Which query correctly prints the salary+bonus column name in result?
options: SELECT salary+bonus AS finalSalary FROM emp;
SELECT salary AS bonus FROM emp;
SELECT bonus AS salary FROM emp;
answer: SELECT salary+bonus AS finalSalary FROM emp;
